titleStmt.title: A vvord in season to the kingdom of England. Or, A precious cordiall for a distempered kingdom. Wherein are laid down things profitable, and usefull for all, and offensive to none that love the truth and peace. / By the meanest of the servants of Jesus Christ, M. Cary.
titleStmt.author: Cary, Mary.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Black-spred Eagle at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
